00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_RVLDECOMPRESSSTREAM_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_RVLDECOMPRESSSTREAM_HPP
00057 
00060 class RVLDecompressStream {
00061 private:
00062   const char* _buffer;
00063   int _bufferSize;
00064   const char* _current;
00065 
00066 public:
00070   RVLDecompressStream( const char* buffer, int size ) {
00071     _buffer = buffer;
00072     _bufferSize = size;
00073     _current = buffer;
00074   }
00075 
00078   RVLDecompressStream& operator>> ( INT64& value ) {
00079     _current = RVLCompress::decompress_longlong( _current, value );
00080     assert( _current - _buffer <= _bufferSize );
00081     return *this;
00082   }
00083 
00086   RVLDecompressStream& operator>> ( UINT64& value ) {
00087     INT64 other;
00088     _current = RVLCompress::decompress_longlong( _current, other );
00089     assert( _current - _buffer <= _bufferSize );
00090     value = other;
00091     return *this;
00092   }
00093 
00096   RVLDecompressStream& operator>> ( int& value ) {
00097     _current = RVLCompress::decompress_int( _current, value );
00098     assert( _current - _buffer <= _bufferSize );    
00099     return *this;
00100   }
00101 
00104   RVLDecompressStream& operator>> ( unsigned int& value ) {
00105     int v;
00106     _current = RVLCompress::decompress_int( _current, v );
00107     value = (unsigned int) v;
00108     assert( _current - _buffer <= _bufferSize );    
00109     return *this;
00110   }
00111 
00114   RVLDecompressStream& operator>> ( float& value ) {
00115     // doubles aren't compressed
00116     memcpy( &value, _current, sizeof value );
00117     _current += sizeof value;
00118     return *this;
00119   }
00121   bool done() const {
00122     return (_current - _buffer) >= _bufferSize;
00123   }
00124 };
00125 
00126 #endif // INDRI_RVLDECOMPRESSSTREAM_HPP
Generated on Tue Nov 16 15:17:22 2004 for INDRI by 1.2.16
